info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued July 29 at 5:14PM MDT until July 29 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque NM
info.description:
FFWABQ
The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for... The Hermits Peak Calf Canyon Burn Scar in... Northern San Miguel County in northeastern New Mexico...
* Until 815 PM MDT.
* At 514 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain over the Hermits Peak Calf Canyon Burn Scar. Between 0.5 and 1.25 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding on the Hermits Peak Calf Canyon burn scar.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams on the Hermits Peak Calf Canyon burn scar.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Sapello, Manuelitas and Rociada.
This includes the following highways... State Road 94 between Mile Markers 1 and 4. State Road 518 between Mile Markers 11 and 13. State Road 276 between Mile Markers 1 and 5. State Road 266 between Mile Markers 0 and 6.
The river basins of highest concern are the Sapello river and Manuelitas creek.
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 8:15 PM MDT. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 8:15 PM MDT. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 8:15 PM MDT. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 8:15 PM MDT. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
